block.p: THE ESTEE LAUDER COS., New York, named Richard W. Kunes, vice president for financial administration and corporate controller, to the post of senior vice president and chief financial officer, effective Oct. 1. He succeeds Robert J. Bigler, who is retiring.
ETOUR.COM, Atlanta, named Donna Packard Lachance to the new post of chief operating officer. She had been director for multimedia at Cable and Wireless Optus, Sydney, Australia.

THE ESTEE LAUDER COS., New York, named Richard W. Kunes, vice president for financial administration and corporate controller, to the post of senior vice president and chief financial officer, effective Oct. 1. He succeeds Robert J. Bigler, who is retiring.
ETOUR.COM, Atlanta, named Donna Packard Lachance to the new post of chief operating officer. She had been director for multimedia at Cable and Wireless Optus, Sydney, Australia.

SUNDERLAND CORP., Las Vegas, a lending and financial services company, named Stephen A. Schneider to the new post of chief operating officer. He had been vice president and business banking team leader at U.S. Bank.
